t: For the director of music. According to gittith. A psalm of David.
Lord,*spn our Lord, how*ld majestic is your name in all the earth! You*pn have set your glory in*ld the heavens.
Through*ln the praise of children and infants you*ld have established a stronghold against your enemies, to*ld silence the foe and the avenger.
When*ln I consider your heavens, the*ld work of your fingers, the*ln moon and the stars, which*ld you have set in place,
what*ln is mankind that you are mindful of them, human*ld beings that you care for them?
You*pn have made them a little lower than the angels and*ld crowned them with glory and honor.
You*ln made them rulers over the works of your hands; you*ld put everything under their feet:
all*ln flocks and herds, and*ld the animals of the wild,
the*ln birds in the sky, and*ld the fish in the sea, all*ld that swim the paths of the seas.
Lord,*spn our Lord, how*ld majestic is your name in all the earth!
